website_summaries.verdict: Rit dyes have a distinguished reputation in the craft community, and this affordable kit is no exception. We like the vibrant colors and straightforward color mixing process.
pros: Rit-quality dye at a very affordable price point
Includes all 3 primary dye colors for mixing
cons: Not a standard Rit dye blend, only works on cloth
Only contains enough dye for 4-5 shirts at most

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the colors in this kit. They came out vibrant and I was able to do 5 adult shirts witch all came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Makes great Face Masks
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bunch of white cotton face masks. Something needed to be done with them. So I decided to try this set. This was my first attempt at doing any kind of tie dye. My friends have given me good reviews so I guess they look ok... haha. Doing a bunch more right now.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Easy affordable and great color
customer_reviews.text: This actually turned out way better than expected. Colors are vibrant and easy to use! Be patient and let the color sit overnight so it become more vibrant before washing!
customer_reviews.author: kirstie sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Dyes bleed
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. The red was faulty so it leaked everywhere when I tried to mix it. The dyes bled right through the gloves they gave so my hands and my daughters hands were colored. First wash I hand washed them, dyes bled throughout the shorts ruining the patterns and designs we created. Waste of money and huge disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: It worked well
customer_reviews.text: It has the primary colors that you can mix to create the secondary colors. Worked very good
customer_reviews.author: Nyla family

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the colors were vibrant on the completed product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good kit for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Kit comes with the 3 primary colors so you have to mix them to get other desired colors. It is a good kit for a good price. I would have liked to see more directions on different methods of tie-dying but otherwise was satisfied with what was provided.
customer_reviews.author: neuler

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The shipping was so quick too
customer_reviews.text: I made the cutest shirt with this stuff. I love it. The shipping was so quick too. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: MARIEL N MEYER

customer_reviews.title: Fun family time
customer_reviews.text: Loved this kit, kids loved it more. And even more they lived there shirts!!
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great for making shirts
customer_reviews.text: This tie dye kit was a great project for my daughter and grandkids. They made tie dye shirts to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Jimmerson

customer_reviews.title: Good product unstable price
customer_reviews.text: Good product but the price has been increased every time we have ordered. First was $10.54, then a dollar more the $1.50 more. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: RobotMonsterPrints

customer_reviews.title: Only half of what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to include the dye powder, bottles, gloves and rubber bands. It only had the bottles of powder and was missing the gloves and rubber bands. smh
customer_reviews.author: Rossi Faust

customer_reviews.title: Tie dye
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use. For the money, it's a great little product.
customer_reviews.author: shawn m maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Useless gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are very thin and hands were stained regardless of use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: When it was delivered the box was dented and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Surges

customer_reviews.title: Awful: Dye did not take to the sheets at all!
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit on a bed sheet for a prop for a show I was working on. The dye did not take to the sheet at all and left they whole thing a ugly green color. I have tie-dyed before so this was not the first time I have tried this and I have never had a problem in the past with other kit's I've used. I am very disappointed and will have to re-do the project with new sheets and a new kit that works. Save yourself the money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Williams

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on anything else but cloth
customer_reviews.text: This dye is not the same type that Rit sells in the powder or liquid. It only works on cloth. It would not dye anything else that I use the regular dye for...specifically animla products like feathers, fur, and hair. It is brilliant when you mix it, but it rinses right out.
customer_reviews.author: Earrol

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant Colors, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Dying fabrics can be a challenge, but tie dying is meant to be fun! This kit made the tie dying process easy without needed additional supplies. Rubber bands, bottles, and gloves were all included in this kit (much appreciated!) I was skeptical at the price point, thinking I would only be able to dye 2-3 garments. However, I was able to dye about 5 pieces, adult & child mixed, with very vibrant colors. The colors did run together like I have experienced with other dyes. I highly recommend for your small, quick tie-dye projects!
customer_reviews.author: TheWeekendChick

customer_reviews.title: Two of the packages were good but the third had broken lids
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for a Girl Scout activity. Two of the packages were good but the third had broken lids. The girls ended up with the product everywhere, no matter how careful. It's a good deal for the price but purchase extra gloves and make sure you wear them to shake up the bottles! The shirts we got from Michael's held the color well so I think it's a good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: McReader

customer_reviews.title: One kit made 3 adult female and 2 adult male shirts and I was happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this twice now since it is such a simple kit to work with. One kit made 3 adult female and 2 adult male shirts and I was happy with the results. You could do more or less shirts depending upon their sizes. Bigger shirts use more dye - common sense! Either way, the kit is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Creating A Simpler Life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made brother a few pairs of tie dye socks for Christmas, and he’s worn them every day since.
customer_reviews.author: Andee Otuafi

customer_reviews.title: Box was smashed
customer_reviews.text: I received this today. When it arrived the box was pretty smashed, which really disappointed me. Once I try it, I’ll edit my post.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. My kids loved it. Easy project for them. We were digging around for other stuff to tie dye.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it! We had to use a cupcake pan to mix colors since it only comes with the 3 primary colors.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because it was fun but it stained all the shirts permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Jeanson

customer_reviews.title: Good dye for tie dying.
customer_reviews.text: The product received was exactly as expected. The instructions were sufficient. A good value, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Boehlke

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed parent
customer_reviews.text: Recieved item fast and was excited to use it, but when we finally decided to use it to make shirts when were disappointed. Because we only recieved 2 different colors instead of 3 like we were supposed to receive. We recieved 2 red dyes and 1 blue and no yellow. So it was quite disappointing to my kids who looked forward to being able to make 3 colored shirts with tie dye but only got to make 2 different colored shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Becca lyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful! We managed to do many more shirts than I expected, too!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time tye-dying and was very effective and simple. Love the quality and colors it produced. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany White

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: this little kit isn't half bad. the colors are now and bright and will last after a wash. the only thing that I thought really sucked was that I wear size LARGE in men's and I could barely dye like 4 of these shirts so I guess when it says "dyes 4-5 shirts" it depends on how big the shirts are.
customer_reviews.author: chris

product_meta.title: PHOENIX VITAL LIFE Rit Tie-Dye Kit
product_meta.description: For over a century Rit Dye has been adding color to your world. This tie dye kit shows how to create 6 unique and creative designs. Kit contains: - 3 blendable colors; Turquoise Blue, Yellow, Fuchsia - 3 easy applicator bottles - 3 latex gloves - 18 rubber bands - detailed how-to brochure. Dyes 5-6 T-shirts.
feature_bullets: Dye up to six t-shirts for yourself and your friends with this great kit
Includes six colorful designs; three fiber-active colors (Turquoise; Yellow; and Fuchsia); eighteen rubber bands; and three latex gloves
Just add water and follow simple instructions.
Vibrant and bright colors that are fade-resistant
Colors won’t bleed and are perfect for cotton fabrics

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars199 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
